document.full_text: the nomination of diplomatic heavyweight ryan crocker as the next u.s. ambassador to afghanistan represents a shift by washington away from a military surge to a new political emphasis as foreign troops prepare to leave, diplomats and analysts said on thursday.
document.title: strategic shift in afghanistan seen under new u.s. envoy
lines_and_colors: the nomination of diplomatic heavyweight ryan crocker as the next u.s. ambassador to afghanistan represents a shift by washington away from a military surge to a new political emphasis as foreign troops prepare to leave, diplomats and analysts said on thursday.
